sources.title: Gekitotsu! Satsujin ken (1974)
sources.description: Takuma Tsurugi takes on the government, the police, the mafia and an international ring of kidnappers who aim to dispossess a beautiful young heiress of her millions. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/gekitotsu-satsujin-ken-1974/
